text: Benny Chan Muk-Sing (; 7 October 1961 â€“ 23 August 2020) was a Hong Kong movie director, producer and screenwriter. He was born in British Hong Kong. During the 1990s, he directed movies like Big Bullet (1996), Who Am I? (1998), and Gen-X Cops (1999). In 2019, Chan was diagnosed with nasopharyngeal cancer. He died at a hospital in Hong Kong from the disease on 23 August 2020, aged 58. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from nasopharynx cancer Category:Chinese movie directors Category:Chinese movie producers Category:Chinese screenwriters Category:20th-century Chinese writers Category:21st-century Chinese writers
title: Benny Chan
